00037                 {
00038                         if (!$this->file_exists())
00039                         {
00040                                 return span($this->file, array('class' => 'missing-file',
00041                                         'title' => l('Missing file')));
00042                         }

00070                 {
00071                         return sprintf('%sassets/images/download_%s_128.png',
00072                                 APPLICATION_ROOT,
00073                                 ends_with($this->file, '.zip') ? 'zip' : 'dmg');

00081                 {
00082                         return substr($this->file, strrpos($this->file, '.') + 1);
00083                 }

00088                                 $this->id,

00106                 public static function total_downloads()
00107                 {
00108                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00109                         $conn->prepare('SELECT SUM(`downloads`) FROM `software_artifacts` WHERE 1');
00110                         $conn->exec();
00111                         $ret = $conn->result(0);
00112                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00113                         return $ret;
